text: Those who have experienced the most, have suffered so much that they have ceased to hate. Hate is more for those with a slightly guilty conscience, and who by chewing on old hate in times of peace wish to demonstrate how great they were during the war.
author: Thor Heyerdahl

text: He belonged to that army known as invincible in peace, invisible in war.
author: William Tecumseh Sherman

text: I think that peace will require two states, a Palestinian state that recognizes the Jewish state.
author: Benjamin Netanyahu

text: 'Peace Train' is a song I wrote, the message of which continues to breeze thunderously through the hearts of millions. There is a powerful need for people to feel that gust of hope rise up again.
author: Cat Stevens

text: While conscience is our friend, all is at peace however once it is offended, farewell to a tranquil mind.
author: Mary Wortley Montagu
